channel.title: Coding in specials and have found 4 errors
channel.description:
[code][code]Well im following Deltas guide. It's very good :D but I've came across a problem I dont know how to fix :S
[code:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_05 :: Results: client.java:1208: cannot find symbol symbol : method specialAtk(boolean,int,int) location: class client specialAtk(true, 50, 282); ^ client.java:1212: cannot find symbol symbol : method specialAtk(boolean,int,int) location: class client specialAtk(true, 25, 252); ^ client.java:1216: cannot find symbol symbol : method specialAtk(boolean,int,int) location: class client specialAtk(false, 25, 248); ^ client.java:5703: cannot find symbol symbol : method SpecAttack() location: class client SpecAttack(); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .
[/code] [/code]
Anybody know what is wrong?

item.title: Coding in specials and have found 4 errors
item.dc:creator: @try_again try again
item.description:
@try_again wrote:

hah bee gee explain more… ? and use code tags and what is blah blah blah supposed to be?

edit - zubmage, like i said im nub… well yeh you got it right :S im an idiot…

So your saying It will fix itself out after i finish ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 08:57:37 AM[/size][hr][code]:: Preparing for compile…
:: Auto-setting envriomental variables…
::
:: Scanning for latest JDK version…
::
:: Found JDK 1.6.0_05
:: Results:
client.java:1208: cannot find symbol
symbol : method specialAtk(boolean,int,int)
location: class client
specialAtk(true, 50, 282);
^
client.java:1212: cannot find symbol
symbol : method specialAtk(boolean,int,int)
location: class client
specialAtk(true, 25, 252);
^
client.java:1216: cannot find symbol
symbol : method specialAtk(boolean,int,int)
location: class client
specialAtk(false, 25, 248);
^
client.java:5703: cannot find symbol
symbol : method SpecAttack()
location: class client
SpecAttack();
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
4 errors
:: Done!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code] Thats after the whole tut

item.title: Coding in specials and have found 4 errors
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

Also add right under the next command…

If thats the code:
public void specAttack() {
server.special.specialAttacks(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks2(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks3(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks4(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks5(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks6(playerId);
}

then add under:

blah blah blah
blah blah
blah blah blah
} <---- Be sure to add under that

public void specAttack() {
server.special.specialAttacks(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks2(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks3(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks4(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks5(playerId);
server.special.specialAttacks6(playerId);
}
